Instruction: Combine chickpeas, onion, garlic, cumin, coriander, baking powder, salt, and pepper in a food processor. Pulse until finely chopped but not completely smooth.
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Fry falafel balls until golden brown and crispy.
For hummus: Combine tahini, lemon juice, garlic, cumin, paprika, and salt in a food processor. Blend until smooth.
Spread hummus on pita bread. Fill with lettuce, tomato, cucumber, onion, and falafel.
